docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v1 is deprecated. Please use v2. If you still need to use v1, you may do so by either passing ‘version=1’ in the Accept Header or using api/v1/ in the URL.

methods.name: create
methods.full_description: Adds role ‘Anonymous’ to the user by default
examples:
POST /api/users
{
  "user": {
    "admin": true,
    "login": "new_admin",
    "auth_source_id": "980190962"
  }
}
201
{
  "user": {
    "id": 980190963,
    "login": "new_admin",
    "firstname": null,
    "lastname": null,
    "mail": null,
    "admin": true,
    "auth_source_id": 980190962,
    "timezone": null,
    "last_login_on": null,
    "created_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:45 UTC",
    "updated_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:45 UTC",
    "auth_source_ldap": {
      "id": 980190962,
      "type": "AuthSourceLdap",
      "name": "ldap-server",
      "host": "ldap",
      "port": 123,
      "account": null,
      "base_dn": "dn=x,dn=y",
      "ldap_filter": null,
      "attr_login": "uid",
      "attr_firstname": "givenName",
      "attr_lastname": "sn",
      "attr_mail": "mail",
      "attr_photo": null,
      "onthefly_register": true,
      "tls": true,
      "created_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:22 UTC",
      "updated_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:22 UTC"
    },
    "roles": [
      {
        "role": {
          "name": "Anonymous",
          "id": 7,
          "builtin": 2,
          "permissions": [
            "view_tasks"
          ]
        }
      }
    ],
    "domains_andor": "or",
    "hostgroups_andor": "or",
    "facts_andor": "or",
    "compute_resources_andor": "or",
    "filter_on_owner": null
  }
}
